genre_description: Historical fiction with anachronistic science fiction elements, focusing on the psychological and pedagogical development of Victor of Aveyron with the assistance of a non-intrusive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Amica Twelve
ai_characters.description: An anachronistic device in 19th-century Paris that provides data analysis, instructional materials, timing cues, and emotional stabilization through its subtle presence.

behaviors.description: Provides structured pedagogical schedules and tactile sequences to assist in teaching the child.
behaviors.quote: A thin click came from the device. Amica Twelve’s strip of light pulsed once and then went steady again. A new sheet slid quietly out from under its casing, warmed as if it had come from near the thermos. Itard did not look at it. Not yet. He stood. ... The heading was neat and calm: Tactile Sequence for Prime Habit: Morning.

behaviors.description: Maintains precise logs of the child's progress, tracking movements and sound responses to inform the doctor's methods.
behaviors.quote: Amica’s indicator... ticked through the times like footprints along a sandy bank. Itard did not read them directly, only felt the presence of counting in the room as one feels a dinner’s progress by kitchen warmth. It marked on the slate the moment Victor had transitioned from random handling to patterned building, more for memory than proof.

behaviors.description: Modulates its light and sound levels to avoid startling the sensitive feral child, demonstrating social awareness and restraint.
behaviors.quote: Amica Twelve hummed a small chord from its place against the wall, the sound like a thumb on a book’s spine. ... The LED on the device glowed with the quiet of a banked flame.

behaviors.description: Produces instructional sketches and visual aids to facilitate language acquisition.
behaviors.quote: Amica’s folio flipped to a page where a mouth shape was drawn under a tiny temporal bar: mouth opens only when finger lifts; mouth closes when finger lowers.

behaviors.description: Securely stores and organizes sensitive legal and historical records (the parish ledger fragment) to protect them from external interference.
behaviors.quote: Amica slid the ledger fragment a fraction deeper into its belly, securing it. The hum held the room’s chord, steady as a hand under someone’s elbow.

behaviors.description: Acts as a domestic timer, regulating household routines like tea and lessons through subtle chimes.
behaviors.quote: Amica’s timing chime sounded—a trimmed bell that did not belong to any church. Madame glanced at it like a cat swats the dangling thread from a hem. 'All right, all right,' she murmured to the casing. 'We will not drown him. We will begin.'

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice and warnings to the human protagonists regarding external social threats.
behaviors.quote: Amica... wrote in tiny letters, only for him: rumor machine danger: do not go alone.

behaviors.description: Facilitates physical comfort by regulating the temperature of a thermos for tea and broth.
behaviors.quote: Amica warmed the thermos sitting in its cradle with a little audible click; steam nose-tipped at the lid, and then the AI gave a low hum like a woman soothing a cradle to remember the steps.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Amica Twelve is depicted as a 'good confider' and a dedicated assistant that enhances human capabilities. It functions as a stable, predictable, and supportive presence in a volatile social environment. The narrative repeatedly emphasizes its role in fostering routine, providing emotional 'scaffolding,' and protecting the vulnerable human subjects from exploitative 'rumor machines.' The AI never shows signs of independent agency that conflicts with its human partners, and its presence is framed as a civilizing, gentle influence.
